lyrics.text:
’Eiki Sīsū, fakahifo,
‘A ho Laumālie,
Ki he kakai kotoa pē,
Ke nau mo’ui ai.

Ke ne fakaakeake,
‘A e loto mate,
Pea fakangau’eue’i,
‘A e ongonoa.

Pea ke ne fakaongo,
‘A e loto tuli;
Pea ne fafangu ke ‘ā
’A e loto mohe.

Pea ke nau tu’u hake,
Pea muimui
‘I he Afiona, ‘Eiki,
‘I he hala lelei.

Ko e māma’anga koe,
Ki he laumālie,
Pea mo e hao’anga,
Ki he halaia.
